s: In the late 1990s, Andrew Reynolds left Birdhouse Skateboards, because he felt that he did not fit in with their image. When Baker was a reality, they made a distribution agreement with Blitz Distribution and by 2008, Baker was the bestselling brand under Blitz Distribution.
